replies.body: Opinions on you, hmmm. Pretty cool, fun to talk to and love seeing you playing Avicus and watching your videos :D
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on you, hmmm. Pretty cool, fun to talk to and love seeing you playing Avicus and watching your videos :D

reply_to.body: Hey! As I ask everyone, what's your opinion on me?
reply_to.body_tagged: Hey! As I ask everyone, what's your opinion on me?

replies.body:
Hey
I live in Australia, South Australia
Yes, my real name is Samuel, friends call me Sam tho ;-D
My favourite food, I dont really like sweets, lollies etc, I do love chips and stuff like that though.
Favourite fruit are grapes
Favourite drink is Chocolate Milkshake
Turtles are cool
I like the colour green, purple and blue, green is my favourite though.
I love the map Rendezvous I, if that is how you spell it xD It was my first map I every played on.
Best friend on Avicus, irl friend probably NDLFC or 28cheetah and In Game probably Holden.
Don't really like chocolate, but both probably.
Opinions on you, Pretty good Avicus player, friendly and nice :D
